channel.title: [317] Changing Delta Forever
channel.description:
[b]Name:[/b] Unknown [b]Source:[/b] Deltascape (Cleaned, Repackaged) [b]Client:[/b] MITB 317 Deob
[center][b][color=green](¯`·._.·[ Table Of Contents]·._.·´¯)[/b] a) Background Information b) Status c) To Do d) TBD e) TBD [/center]
[center][b](¯`·._.·[Background Information]·._.·´¯)[/b][/center] [center]Yes, this source is Deltascape, but this is not like all the other Deltascape's you will see. I have COMPLETELY cleared out the entire source, except for all the essentials. So noone can really say "Ohmahgahdzorz, LEECH" The Client.java is currently 12 KB, and the Server.java is 4 KB. The server will be Runescape Based, with nearly everything like Runescape. The XP Rate will be set at 80 XP per hit, and the economy will be more RS-based then other servers.[/center]
[center][b](¯`·._.·[Server Status]·._.·´¯)[/b][/center] [center][b]Current Completion: 1%[/b]
[ul][li]Added Runescape Side Icons[/li] [li]Edited Gameframe / Cache[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2guimom.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][PvP][/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/attackcb.png[/img] [b]Melee: 0%[/b] [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/magiccb.png[/img][b] Magic: 0%[/b] [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/rangecb.png[/img] [b]Range: 0%[/b]
[center][PvNPC][/center] [center][img]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/attackcb.png[/img] [b]Melee: 0%[/b] [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/magiccb.png[/img][b] Magic: 0%[/b] [IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/rangecb.png[/img] [b]Range: 0%[/b]
[center][Minigames] [b]Pest Control: 0% RS Assault: 0% Fight Caves: 0%[/b]
[center][IMG]http://i869.photobucket.com/albums/ab257/bluescap3/questsicon.png[/img]Quests [b]Lost City: 0% Desert Treasure: 0% The Knight's Legend: 0% Lunar Spirit: 0% Lunar Diplomacy: 0% Monkey Madness: 0% [/b]
[center][b] (¯`·._.· [To Do] ·._.·´¯)
[ul][li]Get a Runescape NPC Dump[/li] [li]Get a Runescape Item Dump[/li] [li][s]Add all commands[/s][/li] [li]Add all skills[/li] [li][s]Add an EventManger[/s][/li] [li]Load Sprites / Models[/li] [li]Add Interfaces[/li] [li]All the other basic stuff >.>[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Will add more later, dont have much time on my hands atm[/center]

item.title: [317] Changing Delta Forever
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Thanks.

Update:
Added all the staff commands.
Removed the need for a large process by adding an EventManager

Found an NPC dump

item.title: [317] Changing Delta Forever
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

It’ll be good.

Currently Working on: Worn Weapons Interface, with Items Kept On Death, Price Checker, and Equipment Stats.

Note: I’m going to make Price Checker read from a file named streetprices.cfg.

The streetprices.cfg will originally read the item.cfg file as price, and then change itself with every buy/sell, pricing the item based on the price given.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:

[quote=“raped by who, post:3, topic:293846”]I’m not sure if I’m releasing the source to this community, as it will probably be leeched GREATLY.

If I do, i’ll add an anti-leech :D[/quote]Hmm not an good idea to release it in my oppinion but if you release it, release it good if you dont want to dont release it also good luck on changeing Delta. Nice gameframe good luck on this
